data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: There is an argument in the courts right now about a car that can drive itself. Two ____ that ____ similar ____ are ____ over ____ can ____ these ____. Many ____ working ____ one ____ have ____ to ____ other. The fight shows how popular this industry is right now.
data.partBlankContent: There is an argument in the courts right now about a car that can drive itself. Two comp_____ that deve_____ similar techn_____ are arg____ over w__ can pro____ these ca__. Many engi_____ working f__ one com____ have go__ to t__ other. The fight shows how popular this industry is right now.
data.fullContent: There is an argument in the courts right now about a car that can drive itself. Two companies that developed similar technology are arguing over who can provide these cars. Many engineers working for one company have gone to the other. The fight shows how popular this industry is right now.
data.answer: 现在法庭上有一场关于汽车能自动驾驶的争论。两家开发了类似技术的公司正在争论谁能提供这些汽车。许多在一家公司工作的工程师跳槽到另一家公司。这场战斗显示了这个行业现在是多么的受欢迎。
